title: 10. Summer sunset bike ride along Sky Road
description: If you’re in Connemara with your sweetheart, a perfect way to spend a summer evening is to ride bikes along the aptly-named Sky Road.

title: 9. Greet St Valentine in Dublin’s Whitefriar Street Church
description: Whitefriar Street Church, founded in the 13th century, is the final resting place of St Valentine!

title: 8. A beachside picnic at quiet beaches like Sliver Stand
description: For a truly romantic experience, picnic at a Mayo’s Silver Stand beach, where you can listen to the waves, taste the salt in the air, and have the sand to yourself!

title: 7. Hiking Ben Bulben’s Gleniff Horseshoe
description: This magical valley is alive with stories and legends, but the one that springs to mind is the tragic love story of Diarmuid and Grainne, mythological lovers eternally pursed by an angry giant.

title: 6. Learn about the Claddagh Ring in Galway
description: The Claddagh Ring, associated with Galway, it is a traditional Irish ring made from two clasped hands holding a crown. The ring is said to represent love, loyalty, and friendship.

title: 5. Horseback at dawn on Streedagh Beach
description: Enjoy a beachside horseback ride, perfect for admiring the sunset on the horizon.

title: 4. Moonlight kayak in Cork’s bio-luminescent water
description: For a truly unique and magical experience with your partner, do a moonlight kayak in Cork. From a dazzling sunset to a starry sky, this is lovely experience to share with your lover.

title: 3. Enjoy adorable Adare & elegant Adare Manor
description: Stroll arm in arm with your other half through the adorable village of Adare, where cute thatched cottages house homey restaurants and snug shops.

title: 2. Jaunting cart/jarvey through the Gap of Dunloe
description: A horse and carriage ride in a charming 19th century buggy through the wild beauty of the Gap of Dunloe in the heart of Killarney National Park – what could be more romantic than that?

title: 1. Cliffs of Moher at Sunset
description: The Cliffs of Moher, an enduring classic. Visiting these massive and beloved cliffs is always a wondrous experience, but visiting with your true love is even better!
